QuestData.Title: Return to Karazhan: Cubic Cynosure
QuestData.Description: Drat! The ancient mana doesn't seem to be working. I need to think the problem through, focus and...$b$bWait, that's it! Focus! We need to focus the energy of the ancient mana to activate the cube.$b$bI've heard tell of a mana wyrm in Karazhan with the means to focus its powers. Might be just what we need!$b$bWatch out, though. My sources tell me this wyrm is humongous!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Mana Focus from the Mana Devourer within Karazhan
